subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kevin Durant scored 30 points and hit a 3-pointer at the buzzer to lift the Thunder to a 104-102 victory against the Mavericks in a rematch of last season’s Western Conference finals.
snippet: Kevin Durant scored 30 points and hit a 3-pointer at the buzzer to lift the Thunder to a 104-102 victory against the Mavericks in a rematch of last season’s Western Conference finals.
